newsitem.title: USA: MCI offers local business service in N.C..
newsitem.headline: MCI offers local business service in N.C..

text.p: MCI Communications Corp said Thursday it would provide local calling services for mid- to large-sized businesses in North Carolina's triangle near Raleigh.
MCI said it started offering local service to business customers early last year and plans to have local service in 31 cities by the end of the year.
The company said it was the first major long-distance company with integrated local service for business customers to compete against BellSouth Corp and GTE Corp.
